TopicTitle: Is there a protractor overlay add on?

Articles.Content:
I need some angle calculation done, and I realized I don't have a protractor handy around the house to slap it the on screen like I am supposed to do the kerbal way.

So I am looking for an addon that simply give me a fancy holographic protractor that I can overlay on the map and do my thing. My search for protractor addon on kerbal space program seemed to give me a plugin that do a lot more for rendezvous calculation, but I don't think I need that much.

This is not a request, just asking if there is one handy around, before I have to print out a paper protractor and stick it on my screen.
MB-Ruler is a Windows-compatible on-screen ruler with protractor capabilities, and was free for personal use, last I looked into it.
Well, while it is not an add-on for KSP, thanks for the suggestion! Works better than my paper protractor, and has more uses!
